ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
ygData.msgSnippet: I m only lvl 21 and I m a Dark Elf. But I m just wondering for when I get higher lvl and want to make the trip. luv, -Su ... the ... actually ... there ... KOS
ygData.messageBody:
I'm only lvl 21 and I'm a Dark Elf. But I'm just wondering for when I get
higher lvl and want to make the trip.
luv,
-Su

> Yeah its no drop. It was verants way of making everyone at least run
> through all the zones once before they started just porting there and
> cutting out some of the running. I know the Cobalt Scar tooth spawns on
the
> ground very close to where, if not the exact place, you port in. Just get
> in the Cobalt Scar zone and ask someone. Its kind of a tough zone
actually
> come to think of it, if you are KoS. Maybe you should just get the great
> divide one for now, what lvl are you? The Great Divide one spawns on the
> ground inside the little building you port into with the port spells. If
> you leave the city of Thura take a right and follow it around a bit. Dont
> do it without sow as there are some nasty creatures out here too. Good
> luck. Ooc for the exact loc.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 9:11 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
>
>
>
> Is the tooth no-drop? How does one get it?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > The "key" is for the velious ports. Its a tooth looking thing and you
> need
> > it to port to certain places there. I think the Cobalt Scar one is the
> last
> > one and allows you to port to any of them. So if you get that one you
> will
> > only need the one "key"/tooth.
> >
> > Mu
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2001 8:03 AM
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
> >
> >
> >
> > Cool! Thanks!
> > One more thing, do I need any items to self port? I heard someone saying
> > they needed a "key" or something to port.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > No they do not. However there are quite a few roaming NPC's in Tox
> > forest.
> > > Some are still blue to 56 (one is an Enchanter). So after you get
there
> I
> > > would invis myself.
> > >
> > > Mu
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 5:43 PM
> > > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > > Subject: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
> > >
> > >
> > > Do the wiz spires/ring in Tox have Erudite guards? Bc, I'm a DE and
KOS
> to
> > > erudites. I just got my tox gate spell and dont' want to go without
> > knowing
> > > if I'll be attacked immediately upon porting.
> > > Thanks.
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
